This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] A constructor with only a scoped custom element registry definition should fail upon construction
  Failed to construct 'CustomElementRegistry': Illegal constructor
[FAIL] A constructor uses the global registry to create an element
  Failed to construct 'CustomElementRegistry': Illegal constructor
[FAIL] A constructor creating an element from another registry before or after super call should work
  Failed to construct 'CustomElementRegistry': Illegal constructor
Harness: the test ran to completion.
